item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. FBI probes second apparent Trump assassination attempt
2. Citigroup strips COO of responsibility after $136mn fine
3. Suspected Trump gunman sought — and failed — to help Ukraine fight Russia
4. Berlin blindsided after JPMorgan asked UniCredit to bid for Commerzbank stake
5. Macron picks foreign minister for EU commissioner after Breton quits
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
